name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Souzou - Sengoku Risshiden
name_original: Nobunaga no Yabou: Souzou - Sengoku Risshiden
description:
Nobunaga no Yabou: Souzou - Sengoku Risshiden is a strategy game developed by Koei Tecmo. It was originally released in 2016. Koei Tecmo Games published the game.
Nobunaga no Yabou: Souzou - Sengoku Risshiden is available on PC, PlayStation 3, PS Vita and PlayStation 4.
